memberdef.name: MPX_ERR_BUSY
memberdef.initializer: 4 /*The controller is busy and not accepting commands */

memberdef.name: MPX_ERR_LEN
memberdef.initializer: 103 /*Length of command and value too long, or NULL*/

memberdef.name: dacInfo
memberdef.initializer: = { "Preamp", "Ikrum", "Shaper", "Disc", "Disc LS", "Shaper Test", "DAC Disc L", "DAC Test", "DAC DISC H", "Delay", "TP Buff In", "TP Buff Out", "RPZ", "GND", "TP Ref", "FBK", "Cas", "TP Ref A", "TP Ref B" }

memberdef.name: optFields
memberdef.initializer: = { "ROI X", "ROI Y", "ROI Width", "ROI Height", "Profile Select", "DACs Present" }

briefdescription.para: Interface library to merlin Labview system.

detaileddescription.para: Interface library to merlin Labview system.

listitem.para:
value - value to set
int - error code

briefdescription.para: Get a value for the specified command.

listitem.para:
value - returned value
int - error code

command - command name
int - error code

detaileddescription.para: This blocks until either a frame is read or the socket is closed (either using mpxDisconnect or another mechanism).
The data buffer must be assigned by the user, and it won't be overwritten until this function is called again.

listitem.para: commandPort - port number to send commands

dataPort - port number to read data from
int - error code

detaileddescription.para: This closes the sockets opened using mpxConnect.
